title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: DELETE API Step
description: Definition of a DELETE API endpoint for soft deleting a pet

title: Path Parameters
description: Using path parameters to capture the pet ID from the URL

title: Soft Deletion
description: Perform a soft delete instead of permanent removal, scheduling the pet for purging

title: Conditional Response
description: Return different responses based on whether the deletion was successful

title: Emits
description: Emit events when a pet is soft deleted to trigger background cleanup processes

title: Handler
description: The handler function that executes when the DELETE request is made

title: Logger
description: Log the soft deletion with details about the purge schedule

title: HTTP Response
description: Returns appropriate HTTP status codes: 202 for accepted, 404 for not found
